AG_COMMAND_INVALID_FORMAT: Invalid "%s" command format. Must be letters, numbers, and dashes.
AG_COMMAND_NOT_FIRST: Command must be passed as the first non-option, non-param argument.
AG_COMMAND_PROVIDED: Command has already been provided as "%s", received another "%s".
AG_CONTEXT_NOT_PROVIDED: Contextual parser options were not provided.
AG_GROUP_MISSING_COUNT: Numeric options must have `count` enabled when passed in a short option group.
AG_GROUP_UNSUPPORTED_TYPE: Only boolean and countable number options may be used in a short option group.
AG_OPTION_NUMBER_COUNT: Only numeric options may use the `count` setting.
AG_OPTION_UNKNOWN_MORE: Unknown option "%s" found. Did you mean "%s"?
AG_PARAM_MISORDERED: Optional param(s) %s found before required param "%s". Required must be first.
AG_PARAM_REQUIRED: Param "%s" is required but value is undefined.
AG_PARAM_REQUIRED_NO_DEFAULT: Required param "%s" has a default value, which is not allowed.
AG_PARAM_UNKNOWN: Unknown param "%s" found. Variadic params are not supported.
AG_SHORT_DEFINED: Short option "%s" has already been defined for "%s".
AG_SHORT_SINGLE_CHAR: Short option "%s" may only be a single letter.
AG_SHORT_UNKNOWN: Unknown short option "%s". No associated long option found.
AG_VALUE_ARITY_UNMET: Not enough arity arguments. Require %d, found %d.
AG_VALUE_INVALID_CHOICE: Invalid value, must be one of %s, found %s.
AG_VALUE_NO_INLINE: Flags and short option groups may not use inline values.
AG_VALUE_NON_ARRAY: Option "%s" is enabled for multiple values, but non-array default value found.
AG_VALUE_NON_BOOL: Option "%s" is set to boolean, but non-boolean default value found.
AG_VALUE_NON_NUMBER: Option "%s" is set to number, but non-number default value found.
AG_VALUE_NON_STRING: Option "%s" is set to string, but non-string default value found.
